name: 蕭耀榮
objective: 課程包含模糊控制與灰色系統，培養學生能運用模糊控制與灰色系統之理論於控制系統及車輛系統上，內容包括模糊集合，近似推理理論，解模糊方法，模糊控制器之設計，模糊控制器之應用，.灰色系統，灰預測原理，灰色建模，灰色控制。
schedule:

1　　ROBOLAB programming I
2　　ROBOLAB programming II
3　　LabVIEW programming I
4　　LabVIEW programming II / Signals and DAQ
5　　Introduction and Fuzzy logics
6　　Fuzzy sets / Fuzzy relations term project announce
7　　Fuzzy graphs and arithmetic Fuzzy rules
8　　Fuzzy implications and approximate reasoning
9　　midterm Exam　　期中考試
10　　Fuzzy logic and probability Fuzzy logic control
11　　Fuzzy logic control
12　　Design of Fuzzy controller
13　　Fuzzy model identification
14　　Introduction of neural network
15　　theory of neural networkproject
16　　design of neural network controller
17　　neural-fuzzy control
18　　report presentation　　期末考試
scorePolicy:
midterm exam: 40%
term project: 10%
project and presentation: 40%
homework and class performance: 10%
materials:
textbook: Fuzzy Logic, by John Yen, published by Wiley
reference book: LabVIEW基礎篇、LEGO and ROBOLAB in Engineering Application (樂高積木與ROBOLAB在工程學上之應用)、機器人作戰秘笈
